results.title: [Sim] Combine integer formatting ops into one op

analysis.description: No exact duplicate found. Issue #6810 is about Arc assertion support infrastructure (verif.assert and sv.assert.concurrent), which is the parent tracking issue for assertion support in Arc. However, this specific crash is about a missing lowering for sim.fmt.literal operations generated from immediate assertions with $error() messages in arcilator. The crash is more specific to the sim dialect formatting pipeline than general assertion support.
key_differences: This crash is specific to sim.fmt.literal legalization failure
It occurs in the arcilator pipeline during Arc conversion
The error is triggered by orphaned sim.fmt.literal ops from immediate assertions with $error()
Issue #6810 is about adding high-level assertion support, not formatting ops
Issue #9467 is about llhd.constant_time, not sim.fmt.literal
